body: @jbbmt10 It's NTR! NTR Logic states "The cuck is made SUPER Dense, Blind and Half Deaf till the writer decides he needs to be made aware, likely at the "Too late mark!" even if it goes beyond the beyond in stupidity, unrealistic (cause no fantasy or sci-fi in this one to explain) and would make alot more sense! "She just needs the fear of getting caught" to tighten her up and make it tense! Plus it's NTR, Stop thinking and get to nutting as the NTR Diehards would say it! They love to say enjoy the art and porn! But frankly I get that from artists who make the same level of art as NTR WITHOUT THE NTR! It's a bad aftertaste that ruins it all because the artist HAS to make it center stage otherwise the diehards will be bitching about not feeling their looking at NTR! They cannot deny this as much as they like to or handwave it! Vanilla is boring, but that's expected! NTR is suppose to be unique, but it's popularity and the copy cat-ing has backfired on it. Uncommon or Rare. Never Common!
I like how easy it is to identify NTR just by looking at the cover art
I guess he would of heard them fucking if he showed up earlier.
Art is ok, anyway end this shit already.
